meanings.sent1: The autarch made all the decisions in the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The autarch's word was law in the land.
meanings.sent3: The autarch decided to ban all sweets in the kingdom, much to the dismay of the citizens.
meanings.sent4: The autarch's control over the kingdom was like a mighty fortress, impenetrable and unyielding.
meanings.sent5: The autarch's power was as vast as the ocean, stretching to every corner of the realm.

meanings.definition: A person who rules with self-sufficiency and independence
meanings.sent1: As an autarch, she managed to thrive on her own in the wilderness.
meanings.sent2: The autarch built her home deep in the forest, away from civilization.
meanings.sent3: The autarch proudly showed off her garden of vegetables grown without any help.
meanings.sent4: She was an autarch in her own right, standing strong and independent in a world of followers.
meanings.sent5: The autarch's spirit of self-reliance shone brightly in everything she did.
